title: Reduced to $100...4 card graded T206 lot...all BVG 3

posts.post_title: Reduced to $100...4 card graded T206 lot...all BVG 3
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a 4 card T206 lot. All cards are pictured below.

The lot is being sold for $100 (which includes insured shipping) payable by regular PayPal or US Postal Money Order.  The first person to post, "I'll take 'em" will be given priority.

I would be happy to sell any individual card for $30, which also includes insured shipping.

Please feel free to send me a PM (or post within this thread) with any questions or offers you may have.

Best regards,

Eric

After taking a remedial course on managing attachments, I finally have all eight pictures attached.

:o
